description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Date Nice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Banana,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sticky Date Nice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make nice-cream, blend frozen bananas in food processor on medium speed for 3 minutes, stopping every 30 seconds to scrape down sides. Scoop out pur√©ed banana into an airtight container and freeze until firm.

Meanwhile, soak dates in 1/2 cup boiling water for 5 minutes. Blend hot water and dates for 2 minutes in a food processor on low until smooth. Add cinnamon, cocoa and vanilla. Blend for 1 minute to combine.
Serve scoops of nice-cream topped with warm date sauce and sprinkled with shredded coconut.
